title: Next Billion Users.
body: The average website is at least 2MB in size. This does not bode well for the next billion users. Users who are coming online for the very first time. Users who come online with sub optimal 2G connections. They miss out on all the benefits of the internet.

comments.body:
I couldn't agree more,
but this is a monumental problem,
much larger than matters discussed on this forum.
